name: Plunder Countless Talents, I Became a God
author: 余太劫
content: In an era of darkness, Lin Luo, who staunchly upheld his moral values, met a tragic end at the hands of others! Fortunately, he found himself back in time before the age of universal profession change began! With a second chance at life, he no longer suppressed his talent for leveling up by killing. The Black Emperor, the Lord of Wishes, Princess Kaguya… In this lifetime, Lin Luo formed a one-man army in the midst of the dark age
